# Production Readiness Skill - Claude Memory

## Quick Reference

### Full Audit
```bash
python3 .claude/skills/production-readiness/scripts/audit.py --full
```

### Domain-Specific Scan
```bash
python3 .claude/skills/production-readiness/scripts/scan.py "<query>" --domain <domain>
```

### Generate Checklist
```bash
python3 .claude/skills/production-readiness/scripts/audit.py --checklist
```

## Available Domains

| Category | Domains |
|----------|---------|
| Security | security, headers, secrets, auth, validation |
| Performance | performance, vitals, bundle, images |
| SEO | seo, i18n, sitemap, robots, schema |
| Accessibility | a11y, keyboard, aria, focus |
| Database | database, indexes, migrations, backup |
| API | api, cors |
| Errors | errors |
| Monitoring | monitoring, logging, alerts, health |
| Deployment | env, ci, rollback, preview |
| Legal | legal, cookies, gdpr, retention |

## Severity Levels

- **CRITICAL**: Must fix before launch
- **HIGH**: Should fix before launch
- **MEDIUM**: Fix within first week
- **LOW**: Fix when possible
